    EDDZ-B0072/26
    DU: 03 02 2026 12:49 AU: 21 04 2026 23:59 EST
    A) EDGG EDMM EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAUXX / I / NBO / E / 245/999 / 5123N01019E262
    E) KARLSRUHE UAC USES THE EUROCONTROL LOGON LIST TO STABILIZE CPDLC
    PERFORMANCE. ALL LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL LOG ON TO KARLSRUHE UAC.
    DATA LINK ADDRESS OF KARLSRUHE UAC IS EDUU. NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT
    SHALL NOT TRY TO LOGON TO EDUU. LOGON FORWARDING FOR NOT LOGON
    LISTED ACFT WILL NOT BE PERFORMED. ALL OPERATORS ARE INVITED TO
    APPLY FOR LOGON LIST ENTRY VIA THE PUBLISHED EUROCONTROL PROCESS
    (AIP GERMANY PAGES GEN 3.4-65 THRU GEN 3.4-70 REFER).

    EXPECTED WITHIN LOWER AND UPPER GERMAN AIRSPACE DUE TO AIRSPACE
    RESTRICTIONS FOR THE EXECUTION OF MILITARY MISSIONS.
    IT IS RECOMMENDED TO CONSIDER THE USE OF EXTRA-FUEL.

    EDDZ-B0065/26
    DU: 27 01 2026 14:43 AU: 27 04 2026 23:59
    A) EDGG EDMM EDWW
    Q) EDXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5123N01019E262
    E) SECURITY - HAZARDOUS SITUATION IN SYRIA
    CIVIL GERMAN AIR OPERATORS ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER FIR DAMASCUS
    (OSTT) BELOW FL260. POTENTIAL RISK FROM ANTI-AVIATION WEAPONRY,
    MILITARY OPERATIONS AND ARMED CONFLICTS.
    FURTHER INFORMATION: WEBSITE OF THE FEDERAL MINISTRY FOR DIGITAL
    AND TRANSPORT OF GERMANY (WWW.BMV.DE/KRISENMANAGEMENT).
    CIVIL GERMAN AIR OPERATORS ARE ADVISED TO TAKE POTENTIAL RISK
    INTO ACCOUNT IN THEIR RISK ASSESSMENT AND ROUTING DECISIONS WITHIN
    FIR DAMASCUS (OSTT) AT AND ABOVE FL260. POTENTIAL RISK TO AVIATION
    FROM MILITARY OPERATIONS.
    THIS NOTAM OVERRULES THE RECOMMENDATION PROVIDED IN THE CURRENTLY
    APPLICABLE AIC.

LIBB FIR BRINDISI FIR - LIMM FIR MILANO FIR - LIRR FIR ROMA FIR

    LIIA-E1428/25
    DU: 13 06 2025 17:27 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/188 / 4119N01321E999
    E) FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY IS REGULATED AS FLW:
    -AIRCRAFT NOT INVOLVED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS MUST NOT
    FLY OVER THE FIRE AREA AND MUST EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION
    WHEN FLYING NEAR IT, CONSIDERING THE POSSIBLE INTERVENTION
    OF FIREFIGHTING ACFT.
    THEREFORE, WHEN AN AERIAL FIREFIGHTING OPERATION IS
    ANNOUNCED/ACTIVE, IT IS PROHIBITED TO FLY IN THE ZONES IDENTIFIED
    BY THE FIRE-FIGHTING AUTHORITIES AND NOTIFIED BY THE COMPETENT
    AUTHORITY OR, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC PROVISIONS:
    I. WITHIN CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC
    COMMUNICATIONS ABOUT THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE FIREFIGHTING
    OPERATIONS FROM THE ENGAGED ACFT, BELOW 760M (2500FT) AGL
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 4KM
    (2 NM) FROM THE FIRE
    II. OUTSIDE CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, BELOW 900M (3000FT) AGL,
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 9KM
    (5NM) FROM THE FIRE.
    -TIMELY UPDATES REGARDING THE ZONES AND AREAS AFFECTED
    CAN BE BROADCAST ON GROUND/AIR/GROUND FREQUENCIES.
    -THE ENGAGED FIREFIGHTING AIRCRAFT KEEP THE ATS UNIT
    RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AFFECTED AREA INFORMED ABOUT THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS AND THEIR CONCLUSION.
    -THE ATS UNIT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS PROVIDES AIR TRAFFIC SERVICES, AS FAR
    AS POSSIBLE:
    1.TO THE AIRCRAFT ENGAGED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS, EXCEPT
    IN THE FIREFIGHTING AREA WHERE IT PROVIDES ONLY FLIGHT INFORMATION
    AND ALERT SERVICES.
    RMK: IF A CTR IS AFFECTED BY THE FIRE, SID/STAR/INSTR APCH PROC COULD
    BE TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED OR MODIFIED
    2.TO OTHER GAT FLIGHTS, BASED ON THE INFORMATION AVAILABLE REGARDING
    THE FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY, WHICH MAY STILL BE INCOMPLETE.
    REF AIP ENR 1.1.1.4 'POLICE, CUSTOMS AND PATROL FLIGHTS ENGAGED IN
    URGENCY MISSIONS', PARAGRAPH C 'FIREFIGHTING'

    LIIA-E1537/25
    DU: 26 06 2025 13:55 AU: 23 09 2025 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET
    LEASE OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE
    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY SHALL EXERCISE ENHANCED
    CAUTION WHEN OVERFLYING NICOSIA FIR (LCCC) DUE TO MONTHLY PLANNED
    FIRING EXERCISES. IT IS REQUESTED TO CAREFULLY FOLLOW
    INSTRUCTIONS FROM CYPRUS AUTHORITIES PROVIDING AIR TRAFFIC
    MANAGEMENT AND TO PAY PARTICULAR ATTENTION TO RESTRICTIONS OR
    INTERDICTIONS PUBLISHED BY CYPRUS AUTHORITIES.

    LIIA-E2875/25
    DU: 16 12 2025 10:02 AU: 15 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF
    AIR SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET LEASE
    OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE
    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY WHEN PLANNING FLIGHT
    OPERATIONS ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID DAMASCUS FIR (OSTT)
    AT ALL ALTITUDES ACCORDING TO EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES

    LIIA-E2876/25
    DU: 16 12 2025 10:08 AU: 15 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE
    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR
    OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET
    LEASE OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE
    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID
    PORTIONS OF DAKAR FIR (GOOO) AND NIAMEY FIR (DRRR) WITHIN TERRITORY
    AND AIRSPACE OF MALI BELOW HEIGHT 25000FT AGL AND ACCORDING TO
    EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES.

    LIIA-E2877/25
    DU: 16 12 2025 10:13 AU: 15 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ITALIAN AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE ISSUED
    BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR OPERATING
    CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET LEASE OR A
    CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE WITH AN AIRCRAFT
    REGISTERED IN ITALY ARE RECOMMENDED TO ENSURE THAT A ROBUST RISK
    ASSESSMENT IS IN PLACE TOGETHER WITH A HIGH LEVEL OF CONTINGENCY
    PLANNING FOR OPERATING IN AIRSPACE OF IRAN OIIX FIR ACCORDING TO
    EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES.

    FIR SIMFEROPOL UKFV, FIR ODESA UKOV, FIR ROSTOV NA DONU URRV.
    SAID OPERATORS AND AIRCRAFT OWNERS SHALL ALSO AVOID FLIGHT OPS
    WITHIN BUFFER ZONE EXTENDED OUT 200NM ALONG UKRAINE RUSSIA BORDER.
    FLIGHT OPS WITHIN CHISHINAU FIR LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN
    IN COMPLIANCE WITH AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS
    ISSUED BY REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. OPERATORS ARE ALSO REMINDED
    THAT FLIGHT OPS WITHIN MINSK FIR UMMV ARE PROHIBITED  AND
    THAT ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS
    SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING IN FIR UUWV, FIR ULLL, FIR USSV,
    FIR UWWW IN ACCORDANCE WITH EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES

    LTAA-A0099/26
    DU: 11 01 2026 21:00 AU: 11 02 2026 20:59
    A) LTBB LGGG
    Q) LTXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3822N02559E357
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:

    THE NOTAM 'A4494/25' ISSUED BY GREEK CAA IN RESPONSE TO THE REQUEST
    OF TURKISH NAVY FOR THE UNMANNED ACFT FLIGHTS IS IRRELEVANT TO THE
    ORIGINAL TURKISH NOTAM REQUEST.

    THE NOTAM 'A4494/25' ITEM 2.2: 'UNMANNED AIRCRAFT SHALL NOT AFFECT
    HELLENIC NATIONAL AIRSPACE LESS THAN 10NM ACCORDING TO AIP-GREECE,
    ENR 1.1-1, PARA 1.1.1.2.1' AND ITEM 2.3: 'FLIGHT PLANS SHALL BE
    SUBMITTED ACCORDING TO ICAO ANNEX 2, APPENDIX 4, PARA 1.6 AND
    ACCORDING TO AIP-GREECE, ENR 1.10 AND GEN 1.7-1.' ARE IRRELEVANT
    AND NOT CONTAINED IN THE ORIGINAL NOTAM REQUEST MADE BY TURKIYE.
    FURTHERMORE THOSE STATEMENTS ARE IN CONTRAVENTION WITH ICAO RULES,
    CONTRADICT WITH THE INTERNATIONAL LAW AND CONSEQUENTLY VIOLATE THE
    RIGHT OF FREE USE OF INTERNATIONAL AIRSPACE.

    IT'S UNPRECEDENTED AND DEFIANT PRACTICE OF GREECE DEFINING 6NM WIDE
    TERRITORIAL WATERS AND 10NM NATIONAL AIRSPACE. ACCORDING TO
    INTERNATIONAL LAW THE AIRSPACE OVER WHICH A STATE CAN CLAIM
    COMPETENCE AND EXCLUSIVE SOVEREIGNTY IS LIMITED TO THAT PORTION
    WHICH LIES ABOVE ITS TERRITORY AND THE TERRITORIAL WATERS ADJACENT
    TO IT.

    TURKIYE REGRETFULLY DENIES AND DOES NOT ACCEPT THE ILLEGAL CLAIMS OF
    GREECE AND ITS MISUSE OF FIR RESPONSIBILITIES IN ORDER TO DEFEND ITS
    OWN UNBASED NATIONAL POSITION. TURKISH NAVY UNMANNED ACFTS WILL
    CONTINUE TO CONDUCT THEIR FLIGHTS RESPECTING THE 6NM GREEK AIRSPACE
    AND WITHOUT SUBMITTING ANY FLIGHT PLAN AS BEING MILITARY AIRCRAFT
    WHICH IS NOT SUBJECT TO 1944 CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL CIVIL
    AVIATION. TURKIYE WILL TAKE ALL NECESSSARY MEASURES FOR THE SAFETY
    OF THE GENERAL AIR TRAFFIC AND STAND BY FOR COOPERATION AND
    COORDINATION.

    LTAA-A0138/26
    DU: 13 01 2026 08:00 AU: 31 12 2026 16:00

    AND GREEK WARNING NOTAMS IN REF (C) ARE NULL AND VOID.

    WILL BE GIVEN TO ANY OBJECTION RAISED TO TURKISH NOTAMS IN REF (A).

    BY GREEK CAA.
    THE 'A0242/26' NOTAM ISSUED BY GREEK CAA CONSTITUES A BREACH OF
    GREECE'S TREATY OBLIGATIONS PERTAINING TO THE DEMILITARIZED STATUS
    OF EASTERN AEGEAN ISLANDS UNDER 'THE 1947 PARIS PEACE TREATY' KERPE
    (SCARPANTO) MENTIONED IN THE NOTAM AT REFERENCE HAS A DEMILITARIZED
    STATUS. THUS KERPE (SCARPANTO) AND/OR HER TERRITORY MUST NOT BE
    INCLUDED IN ANY SCENERIO/CONCEPT OF ANY MILITARY TRAINING OR
    EXERCISE.

    THE 'A0244/26' AND 'A0245/26' NOTAM ISSUED BY GREEK CAA CONSTITUES A
    BREACH OF GREECE'S TREATY OBLIGATIONS PERTAINING TO THE
    DEMILITARIZED STATUS OF EASTERN AEGEAN ISLANDS UNDER 'THE 1914 SIX
    POWERS' DECISION', 'THE 1923 LAUSANNE PEACE TREATY (WITH ITS ANNEX,
    THE CONVENTION RELATING TO THE REGIME OF THE STRAITS)' AND  'THE
    1947 PARIS PEACE TREATY'. LIMNI (LEMNOS), BOZBABA (AYA EVSTRATIOS),
    MIDILLI (MITYELENE), SAKIZ (CHIOS), SISAM (SAMOS), ILEKI (TILOS) AND
    HERKE (CALKI) MENTIONED IN THE NOTAM AT REFERENCE HAS A
    DEMILITARIZED STATUS. THUS CONVENTION RELATING TO 'THE REGIME OF THE
    STRAITS' AND 'THE 1947 PARIS PEACE TREATY'. LIMNI (LEMNOS),
    BOZBABA(AYA EVSTRATIOS), MIDILLI (MITYELENE), SAKIZ (CHIOS), SISAM
    (SAMOS), ILEKI (TILOS) AND HERKE (CALKI) AND/OR HER TERRITORY MUST
    NOT BE INCLUDED IN ANY SCENERIO/CONCEPT OF ANY MILITARY TRAINING OR
    EXERCISE.

    TURKIYE ALSO WOULD LIKE TO EMPHASIZE THAT NO FURTHER EXPLANATION
    WILL BE GIVEN TO ANY OBJECTION RAISED TO TURKISH NOTAM IN REF (A).

OPKR FIR KARACHI FIR - OPLR FIR LAHORE FIR

    OPKC-A0031/26
    DU: 20 01 2026 07:00 AU: 23 02 2026 23:59
    A) OPKR OPLR
    Q) OPXX / QAFLP / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 2945N06905E999
    E) PAKISTAN AIRSPACE NOT AVBL FOR INDIAN REGISTERED ACFT AND
    ACFT OPERATED/OWNED OR LEASED BY INDIAN AIRLINES/OPERATORS
    INCLUDING MILITARY FLIGHTS.
    FROM GND - UP TO UNL.

ZWUQ FIR URUMQI FIR - ZPKM FIR KUNMING FIR

    ZBBB-A0360/24
    DU: 19 02 2024 08:36 AU: PERM
    A) ZWUQ ZPKM
    Q) ZWXX / QAFLP / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3510N09417E999
    E) AIRCRAFT FLYING WITHIN VIDF FIR,VNSM FIR,VEGF FIR, SHOULD AVOID
    DEVIATION TO ZPKM FIR AND ZWUQ FIR WITHOUT PERMISSION. UNDER
    SPECIAL SITUATIONS, RELATED ATC UNIT OR FLIGHT CREW MUST APPLY TO
    CHINA ATC,GET PERMISSION IN ADVANCE,AND KEEP MONITORING 121.5MHZ.
    NOTE:FOR THE FLIGHT WITH PERMISSION NUMBER FROM CAAC CAN OPERATE
    NORMALLY IN CHINA AIRSPACE.

LDZO FIR ZAGREB FIR

    LDZA-A3875/25
    DU: 21 11 2025 08:10 AU: 20 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LDZO
    Q) LDZO / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4348N01619E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS:
    ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY
    CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR
    OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY CROATIAN
    AIRSPACE (ZAGREB FIR) EXCEPT HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT
    ONE-WAY RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE MINISTRY OF THE
    SEA, TRANSPORT AND INFRASTRUCTURE AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING
    OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.

    LDZA-A0061/26
    DU: 09 01 2026 07:30 AU: 09 04 2026 12:00 EST
    A) LDZO
    Q) LDZO / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4348N01619E999
    E) ALL FLIGHTS TO/FROM AIRPORTS OF THE REPUBLIC OF CROATIA OR
    OVERFLYING CROATIAN TERRITORY ARE NOT ALLOWED IF AIRCRAFT ARE
    OPERATED BY BELARUSSIAN AIR CARRIERS AND/OR REGISTRATED IN BELARUS
    EXCEPT FOR AIRCRAFT IN EMERGENCY OR HUMANITARIAN FLIGHTS.

    LDZA-A0264/26
    DU: 30 01 2026 07:26 AU: 30 04 2026 12:00 EST
    A) LDZO
    Q) LDZO / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4348N01619E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS:
    MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION.
    CROATIAN AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN CROATIA
    SHALL NOT ENTER UIR KYIV (UKBU), FIR LVIV (UKLV), FIR KYIV (UKBV),
    FIR DNIPROPETROVSK (UKDV), FIR SIMFEROPOL (UKFV), FIR ODESA (UKOV),
    FIR ROSTOV-ON-DON (URRV).
    SAID OPERATORS AND AIRCRAFT OWNERS SHALL ALSO AVOID FLIGHT
    OPERATIONS WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200NM ALONG THE
    UKRAINE/RUSSIA BORDER. OPERATIONS WITHIN THE FIR CHISINAU (LUUU)
    AIRSPACE SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN IN COMPLIANCE WITH APPLICABLE
    AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA.
    OPERATORS ARE REMINDED THAT OPERATIONS WITHIN FIR MINSK (UMMV) ARE
    PROHIBITED IN ACCORDANCE WITH EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES SD-2021-02 AND
    SD-2021-03.
    ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE
    TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING IN THE FOLLOWING AIRSPACE: MOSCOW (UUWV).

    Q) LAAA / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4109N01959E999

    CONDITIONS:

    UNION AVIATION SAFETY AGENCY) AIRWORTHINESS DIRECTIVE NR 2021-0039
    DATED 27 JANUARY 2021 AND SUBSEQUENT REVISIONS

    CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY SAFETY DIRECTIVE AAC SD NO:2021-01 DATED 28
    APRIL 2021 AND SUBSEQUENT REVISIONS.

    LAAA-A0031/26
    DU: 29 01 2026 10:21 AU: 29 04 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LAAA
    Q) LAAA / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4109N01959E999
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION.

    SHALL NOT ENTER: FIR LVIV (UKLV), FIR KYIV (UKBV), UIR KYIV (UKBU),
    FIR DNIPROPETROVSK (UKDV), FIR SIMFEROPOL (UKFV), FIR ODESA (UKOV),
    FIR ROSTOV-NA-DONU (URRV).
    ADDITIONALLY, OPERATORS SHOULD EXERCISE CAUTION WHEN OPERATING IN
    THE WHOLE FIR MOSCOW (UUWV) DUE TO HEIGHTENED MILITARY ACTIVITY
    WHICH MAY INCLUDE LAUNCHES OF MID-RANGE MISSILES PENETRATING INTO
    CONTROLLED AIRSPACE.
    OPERATORS ARE REMINDED THAT OPERATIONS WITHIN FIR MINSK (UMMV) ARE
    PROHIBITED.

LGGG FIR ATHINAI FIR

    LGGG-A1709/7
    DU: 06 09 2007 10:00 AU: PERM
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / W / 000/999 / 3738N02456E356
    E) WITH REFERENCE TO TURKISH AIP PAGE ENR 2.1-1 AND TURKISH AIP SUP
    27/05 WE STATE THE FLW:
    IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT REACHED IN
    THE SECOND MIDDLE EAST REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION MEETING (ISTANBUL
    1950) THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BDRY BTN POINTS 404500N0261000E AND
    360500N0300000E COINCIDES WITH THE WESTERN FRONTIER OF TURKEY.
    THIS AGREEMENT WAS SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 14
    DEC 1950 (DOC 7055 MID/2-RAC).
    FURTHERMORE THE SAID ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BDRY WAS DEPICTED ON MAP
    NUMBER 7 ATTACHED TO THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT WHICH WAS
    REACHED IN THE THIRD REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION CONFERENCE (PARIS 1952)
    AND SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 23 JUNE 1952.
    CONSEQUENTLY ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BDRY BTN THE ABOVE MENTIONED
    POINTSLIES ON AN INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENT APPROVED BY ICAO AND
    ACCEPTED BY GREECE AND TURKEY.

    LGGG-A1716/7
    DU: 07 09 2007 07:30 AU: PERM
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / W / 000/999 / 3738N02456E356
    E) REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A1709/07 LGGGYNYX.
    REF (B) TURKISH-AIP SUP 32/05 (29 SEP 2005).
    NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REFERENCE IS MADE TO REF (B) TURKISH-AIP SUP 32/05 IN ORDER TO STATE
    THAT THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY BETWEEN POINTS
    404500N0261000E AND 360500N0300000E HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED BY ICAO
    REGIONAL AGREEMENTS AND CONSEQUENTLY IS FOUNDED ON THE FIRMEST
    POSSIBLE LEGAL BASIS AS NOTED IN OUR REF (A) NOTAM A1709/07
    LGGGYNYX.
    BESIDES IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ICAO RULES AND REGULATIONS THE ONLY
    COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO ISSUE NOTAMS WITHIN ATHINAI FIR IS THE
    HELLENIC CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY THROUGH ITS APPROPRIATE AIS UNIT.
    CONSEQUENTLY THE ABOVE MENTIONED TURKISH-AIP SUP 32/05 CANNOT
    PRODUCE ANY LEGAL EFFECT INTERNATIONALLY AS REGARDS ATHINAI FIR.

    LGGG-A0099/15
    DU: 20 01 2015 17:31 AU: PERM
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3853N02445E999
    E) NAVIGATION WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    IN RELATION TO TURKISH NOTAM A0232/15 WHICH REFERS TO ATS ROUTES
    R19, L995/UL995 IT IS NOTED THAT THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO
    PROMULGATE SUCH NOTAMS WITHIN THESE ROUTES, IS IN ACCORDANCE WITH
    ICAO RULES AND REGULATIONS, THE HELLENIC CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY
    THROUGH ITS APPROPRIATE AIS UNIT.
    THEREFORE THE ABOVE TURKISH NOTAM A0232/15 IS NULL AND VOID SINCE IT
    IS ISSUED BY AN ANAUTHORISED AUTHORITY.

    LGGG-A2109/15
    DU: 20 10 2015 09:57 AU: PERM
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3853N02445E999
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A2086/15 LGGGYNYX.
    REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A4814/15 LTAAYNYX (191430 EUECYIYN OCT 2015).
    REFERENCE IS MADE TO THE ABOVE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A4814/15
    LTAAYNYX IN ORDER TO STATE THAT THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY
    BETWEEN POINTS 404500N0261000E AND 360500N0300000E HAS BEEN
    ESTABLISHED BY ICAO REGIONAL AGREEMENTS WITH THE PARTICIPATION AND
    APPROVAL OF TURKEY AND CONSEQUENTLY IS FOUNDED ON THE FIRMEST
    POSSIBLE LEGAL BASIS AS NOTED IN OUR A1709/07 LGGGYNYX NOTAM.
    MORE SPECIFICALLY THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT REACHED IN
    THE SECOND MIDDLE EAST REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION MEETING (ISTANBUL
    1950) AGREED THAT THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY BETWEEN POINTS
    404500N0261000E AND 360500N0300000E FOLLOWS THE WESTERN FRONTIER OF
    TURKEY. THIS AGREEMENT WAS SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED  BY THE ICAO
    COUNCIL ON 14 DEC 1950 (DOC 7055 MID/2-RAC).
    FURTHERMORE THE SAID ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY WAS DEPICTED ON
    CHART NUMBER 7 ATTACHED TO THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT
    WHICH WAS REACHED IN THE THIRD REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATIONAL CONFERENCE
    (PARIS 1952) AND SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 23
    JUNE 1952.
    CONSEQUENTLY, THE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A4814/15 LTAAYNYX (191430
    EUECYIYN OCT 2015) HAS NO GROUND, IS CONSIDERED NULL AND VOID AND
    THUS CANNOT PRODUCE ANY LEGAL EFFECT.
    THE ONLY VALID AND EFFECTIVE NOTAM WITHIN ATHINAI FIR IS REF (A)
    A2086/15 LGGGYNYX, ISSUED BY GREECE.

    LGGG-A0582/19
    DU: 20 02 2019 09:07 AU: PERM
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REF (A) GREEK NOTAMS A1709/07 AND A1716/07 LGGGYNYX.
    REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A1058/19 (181345 EUECYIYN FEB 2019).
    THE LEGAL FACTS AS WELL AS THE LEGAL REQUIREMENTS SET IN THE REF (A)
    GREEK NOTAMS ARE BASED ON ICAO REGIONAL AGREEMENTS APPROVED BY THE
    ICAO COUNCIL AND ACCEPTED BY GREECE AND TURKEY.
    MORE SPECIFICALLY THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT REACHED IN
    THE SECOND MIDDLE EAST REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION MEETING (ISTANBUL
    1950) AGREED THAT THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY BETWEEN POINTS
    404500N0261000E AND 360500N0300000E COINCIDES WITH THE WESTERN
    FRONTIER OF TURKEY.THIS AGREEMENT WAS SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE
    ICAO COUNCIL ON 14 DEC 1950 (DOC 7055 MID/2-RAC).
    FURTHERMORE THE SAID ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY WAS DEPICTED ON
    CHART NUMBER 7 ATTACHED TO THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT
    WHICH WAS REACHED IN THE THIRD REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATIONAL CONFERENCE
    (PARIS 1952) AND SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 23
    JUNE 1952. CONSEQUENTLY THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY BETWEEN
    THE ABOVE MENTIONED POINTS IS FOUNDED ON THE FIRMEST LEGAL BASIS
    SINCE IT HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED BY INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS REACHED
    IN THE FRAMEWORK OF ICAO AND ACCEPTED BY GREECE AND TURKEY.
    CONSEQUENTLY THE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A1058/19 LTAAYNYX (181345
    EUECYIYN FEB 2019) HAS NO GROUND, CANNOT PRODUCE ANY INTERNATIONALLY
    LEGAL EFFECT WITHIN ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS UIR AND IS CONSIDERED NULL
    AND VOID.
    THE ONLY VALID AND EFFECTIVE NOTAMS WITHIN ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS UIR
    ARE THE REF (A) GREEK NOTAMS A1709/07 AND A1716/07 LGGGYNYX.

    DU: 18 11 2025 10:18 AU: 18 02 2026 23:59
    A) LGGG

    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION.

    NOT ENTER UIR KYIV (UKBU), FIR LVIV (UKLV), FIR KYIV (UKBV), FIR

    ISSUED BY REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA.

    LGGG-A4031/25
    DU: 18 11 2025 10:33 AU: 18 02 2026 23:59
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E999
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION:
    ALL RUSSIAN REGISTERED ACFT AND ACFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR
    OPERATED BY NATURAL OR LEGAL PERSONS FROM THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION OR
    OPERATORS HOLDING AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE
    RUSSIAN FEDERATION ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, LAND IN, TAKE-OFF FROM,
    OR OVERFLY GREEK NATIONAL AIRSPACE, EXCEPT HUMANITARIAN, MEDEVAC AND
    SAR FLIGHTS, OR ANY OTHER FLIGHT, AS IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR
    EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT, BY PERMISSION OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE
    HELLENIC REPUBLIC. ALL ACFT OPERATORS OF NON-SCHEDULED FLIGHTS
    BETWEEN RUSSIA AND GREECE, OPERATED DIRECTLY OR VIA A THIRD COUNTRY,
    SHALL NOTIFY ALL RELEVANT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE FLIGHT,
    AT LEAST 48 HOURS IN ADVANCE TO HELLENIC CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY
    CONTACT: FLIGHTPERMISSION(AT)HCAA.GOV.GR.

    LGGG-A4430/25
    DU: 23 12 2025 13:18 AU: 23 03 2026 23:59
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / I / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) AIR CARRIERS OPERATING FLIGHTS TO GREECE, ORIGINATING FROM
    AIRPORTS IN COUNTRIES OUTSIDE THE EUROPEAN UNION AND SCHENGEN
    ASSOCIATED COUNTRIES (EXTRA-EU/EXTRA-SCHENGEN FLIGHTS) REGARDLESS OF
    THE ROUTE THEY FOLLOW TO THEIR FINAL DESTINATION AIRPORT, ARE
    REQUIRED TO CONTACT BORDER AUTHORITIES OF GREECE AT THE EMAIL
    ADDRESS: TES.BORDERPROTECTION(AT)ASTYNOMIA.GR IN ORDER TO CONNECT TO
    THE ADVANCED PASSENGER INFORMATION SYSTEM-APIS AND TO RECEIVE THE
    APIS IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE.

    LGGG-A4490/25
    DU: 02 01 2026 05:00 AU: 31 12 2026 16:00
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REF (A) TURKISH NOTAM A5935/25 (301053 EUECYIYN DEC 2025).
    AND TURKISH NOTAM REQUEST MESSAGE 250822 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    REF (B) GREEK COORDINATION MESSAGE 291255 LGACYAYC DEC 2025.
    THIS NOTAM IS ISSUED TO STATE THAT THE REF (A) TURKISH NOTAM
    A5935/25 (301053 EUECYIYN DEC 2025) IS NULL AND VOID SINCE IT REFERS
    TO TURKISH MILITARY ACTIVITIES WITHIN ATHINAI FIR, WHERE THE ONLY
    COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO PROMULGATE NOTAMS IN ACCORDANCE WITH ICAO
    RULES AND REGULATIONS IS THE HELLENIC CAA THROUGH ITS APPROPRIATE
    AIS UNIT AND THE ONLY RESPONSIBLE AUTHORITY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE
    AIR TRAFFIC IS THE HELLENIC CAA THROUGH THE ATS UNITS.
    AS HAS BEEN CONSISTENTLY NOTED IN THE PAST, AND WITH THE REF (B)
    291255 LGACYAYC DEC 2025 GREEK COORDINATION MESSAGE TO TURKEY, PARTS
    OF THE AREA MENTIONED IN TURKISH NOTAM A5935/25 (301053 EUECYIYN DEC
    2025) OVERLAP AREAS OF NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY OF GREECE.
    FURTHERMORE, THE TURKISH REQUEST ENTAILS LONG-TERM RESERVATION
    OF AIRSPACE CONTRARY TO THE RELEVANT ICAO RECOMMENDATIONS.
    MOREOVER, THE REQUESTED EXERSICE AREA OVERLAPS PART OF LIMNOS TMA
    AND IT ALSO AFFECTS PART OF G33 AND T162 INTERNATIONAL AIRWAYS AS
    WELL AS DOMESTIC AIR TRAFFIC.
    CONSEQUENTLY, THE AREA AS REQUESTED IS NOT AVAILABLE.
    FOR THE ABOVE MENTIONED REASONS THE TURKISH NOTAM A5935/25 (301053
    EUECYIYN DEC 2025) IS NULL AND VOID AND NOT APPLICABLE TO ATHINAI FIR
    .

    .

    LGGG-A4500/25
    DU: 02 01 2026 05:00 AU: 31 12 2026 16:00
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A4492/25 (310745 EUECYIYN DEC 2025).

    301123 EUECYIYN DEC 2025).

    THIS NOTAM IS ISSUED TO STATE THAT THE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAMS
    A5952/25 AND A5937/24 LTAAYNYX (310952 AND 301123 EUECYIYN DEC 2025)
    ARE NULL AND VOID SINCE THEY REFER TO TURKISH MILITARY ACTIVITIES
    WITHIN ATHINAI FIR, WHERE THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO PROMULGATE
    NOTAMS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE INTERNATIONAL RULES AND REGULATIONS IS
    THE HELLENIC CAA THROUGH THE HELLENIC ATS AND AIS UNITS.
    FURTHERMORE THE HELLENIC POSITIONS REGARDING THE SAID MILITARY
    ACTIVITIES ANNOUNCED BY REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A5937/25 HAVE ALREADY
    BEEN EXPRESSED IN THE REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A4492/25, WHICH IS THE
    ONLY VALID AND EFFECTIVE WITHIN ATHINAI FIR, AND THEY REMAIN
    UNCHANGED.

    LGGG-A0063/26
    DU: 11 01 2026 21:00 AU: 11 02 2026 20:59
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A4494/25 (311003 EUECYIYN DEC 2025).
    REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0099/26 (090812 EUECYIYN JAN 2026).
    WITH REFERENCE TO REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0099/26 WE POINT OUT THAT
    THE ASSERTIONS CONTAINED THEREIN ARE REJECTED AS MISLEADING AND
    DEVOID OF ANY LEGAL BASIS. IN THIS RESPECT AND FURTHER TO THE REF
    (A) GREEK NOTAM A4494/25, PARA 2.2, WE REITERATE THAT GREECE,
    ESTABLISHED IN 1931 IN ACCORDANCE WITH INTERNATIONAL LAW A
    TERRITORIAL SEA OF TEN NAUTICAL MILES FOR THE PURPOSES OF AVIATION
    AND THE CONTROL THEREOF.
    THEREFORE, GREEK AIRSPACE DOES NOT EXCEED THE BREADTH OF THE
    TERRITORIAL SEA AS ESTABLISHED IN 1931.
    GREECE, THEREFORE,  FULLY ABIDES BY INTERNATIONAL LAW AND WILL
    CONTINUE TO DO SO WHILE FULLY EXERCISING ITS SOVEREIGNTY. IN FACT, AS
    FAR AS INTERNATIONAL LAW IS CONCERNED, TURKEY IS THE ONLY COUNTRY,
    REGRETTABLY, WHICH ALSO FAILS TO RESPECT THE PROVISIONS OF THE
    CHICAGO CONVENTION WITHIN THE ATHINAI FIR, WHERE, IN ACCORDANCE WITH
    THE ICAO REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENTS OF 1950-1952-1958, THE
    GREEK AUTHORITIES ARE THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITIES CHARGED TO
    IMPLEMENT THE RELEVANT PROVISIONS OF THE CHICAGO CONVENTION AND TO
    ENSURE UNIMPEDED, REGULAR AND SAFE AIR TRAFFIC.
    ALSO, REFERENCE IS MADE TO THE ABOVE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0099/26
    IN ORDER TO STATE THAT THE ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY BETWEEN
    POINTS 404500N0261000E AND 360500N0300000E HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED BY
    ICAO REGIONAL AGREEMENTS (REACHED IN THE SECOND MIDDLE EAST REGIONAL
    AIR NAVIGATION MEETING, ISTANBUL 1950 AND SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED  BY
    THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 14 DEC 1950, DOC 7055 MID/2-RAC) WITH THE
    PARTICIPATION AND APPROVAL OF TURKEY AND IN FEB 1958, (DOC 7870,
    EUM/IV) AND CONSEQUENTLY IS FOUNDED ON THE FIRMEST POSSIBLE LEGAL
    BASIS AS NOTED IN OUR A1709/07 LGGGYNYX NOTAM.
    FURTHERMORE THE SAID ATHINAI/ISTANBUL FIR BOUNDARY WAS DEPICTED ON
    CHART NUMBER 7 ATTACHED TO THE REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATION AGREEMENT
    WHICH WAS REACHED IN THE THIRD REGIONAL AIR NAVIGATIONAL CONFERENCE
    (PARIS 1952) AND SUBSEQUENTLY APPROVED BY THE ICAO COUNCIL ON 23
    JUNE 1952.
    ACCORDINGLY, GREECE HAS BEEN ASIGNED RESPONSIBILITY FOR ALL ATM
    SERVICES AND ICAO PURPOSES AS WELL AS FOR SAR  WITHIN
    ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS UIR AND IS THE ONLY COMPETENT THEREIN.
    FINALLY, THE ADDITIONAL PROVISION MENTIONED IN PARAGRAPH 2.3 OF
    THE REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A4494/25 (311003 EUECYIYN DEC 2025) AIM AT
    THE PROMOTION OF SAFETY, REGULARITY AND EFFICIENCY OF INTERNATIONAL
    AIR NAVIGATION AND FOR UNMANNED AIRCRAFT IDENTIFICATION PURPOSES IN
    CONFORMITY WITH ARTICLE 3 (D) OF THE ICAO CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL
    CIVIL AVIATION AS AMPLIFIED BY THE A40-04 ICAO ASSEMBLY RESOLUTIONS,
    APPENDIX I, RESOLVING  CLAUSE 2, SEE ALSO THE ANNEX 2, APPENDIX 4, TO
    THE ICAO CONVENTION ON INTERNATIONAL CIVIL AVIATION AS WELL AS
    ARTICLE 12 OF THE ICAO CONVENTION AND THE ESTABLISHED INTERNATIONAL
    PRACTICE.
    CONSEQUENTLY, THE POINTS RAISED BY TURKEY IN REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM
    A0099/26 (090812 EUECYIYN JAN 2026), ARE IRRELEVANT AND THE SAID
    NOTAM IS NULL AND VOID AND NOT APPLICABLE TO ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS
    UIR. THE REQUIREMENTS EXPRESSED IN THE REF (A) GREEK NOTAM
    A4494/25 ARE FULLY IN FORCE.

    LGGG-A0097/26
    DU: 15 01 2026 07:42 AU: 15 04 2026 23:59
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E999
    E) OVERFLYING AND LANDING ON HELLENIC TERRITORY IS FORBIDDEN TO ALL
    AIRCRAFT DEPARTING FROM LIBYA.
    EXEMPTIONS:
    -HELLENIC STATE AIRCRAFT.
    -MILITARY AIRCRAFT OF OTHER NATIONS ONLY IF AUTHORISED BY COMPETENT
    HELLENIC MILITARY AUTHORITY.
    -STATE FLIGHTS OR OTHER VIP FLIGHTS AUTHORISED BY HELLENIC MINISTRY
    OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS.
    -HUMANITARIAN, MEDEVAC AND SAR FLIGHTS OR ANY OTHER FLIGHT, AS IN
    CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.
    -THE FOLLOWING COMMERCIAL OPERATORS/AIRCRAFT PROVIDED THAT THE
    RELEVANT AVIATION SECURITY REQUIREMENTS IMPOSED BY HCAA IN
    ACCORDANCE WITH NATIONAL AVIATION SECURITY PROGRAMME ARE MET:
    EPSILON AVIATION SA: SX-SEM, 9H-MRQ
    MARATHON AIRLINES: SX-ASK, SX-PTM, SX-RMA
    AIR MEDITERRANEAN: SX-MAM, SX-MAT
    TURKISH AIRLINES
    MEDSKY: 9H-MSA, 9H-MSB, 9H-MMO.

    LGGG-A0136/26
    DU: 23 01 2026 18:00 AU: 24 02 2026 17:00
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    REF (A) TURKISH NOTAM A0238/26 (200726 EUECYIYN JAN 2026), TURKISH
    NOTAM REQUEST MESSAGE 250700 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    REF (B) GREEK COORDINATION MESSAGE 151120 LGACYAYC JAN 2026.
    THIS NOTAM IS ISSUED TO STATE THAT THE REF (A) TURKISH NOTAM
    A0238/26 (200726 EUECYIYN JAN 2026) IS NULL AND VOID SINCE IT REFERS
    TO TURKISH ACTIVITIES WITHIN ATHINAI FIR, WHERE THE ONLY COMPETENT
    AUTHORITY TO PROMULGATE NOTAMS IN ACCORDANCE WITH ICAO RULES AND
    REGULATIONS IS THE HELLENIC CAA THROUGH ITS APPROPRIATE AIS UNIT AND
    THE ONLY RESPONSIBLE AUTHORITY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE AIR TRAFFIC IS
    THE HELLENIC CAA THROUGH THE ATS UNITS.
    GREECE'S REFUSAL TO PROMULGATE A NOTAM FOLLOWING THE TURKISH REQUEST
    IS DUE TO THE FACT THAT TURKEY INSISTS TO SUBMITTING REQUESTS THAT
    ARE NOT IN LINE WITH ICAO RULES, REGULATIONS AND RECOMMENDATIONS AS
    WELL AS WITH INTERNATIONAL LAW AND ALSO REFUSES TO COORDINATE WITH
    THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITY WITHIN ATHINAI FIR, THE HCAA.
    AS IT HAS BEEN CONSISTENTLY NOTED IN THE PAST AND WITH THE REF (B)
    151120 LGACYAYC JAN 2026 GREEK COORDINATION MESSAGE, WHICH WAS
    IGNORED BY TURKEY, PARTS OF THE AREA MENTIONED IN TURKISH NOTAM
    A0238/26 (200726 EUECYIYN JAN 2026) OVERLAP AREAS OF NATIONAL
    SOVEREIGNTY OF GREECE.
    ADDITIONALLY, SEARCH AND RESCUE REGION UNDER GREEK RESPONSIBILITY
    COINCIDES WITH ATHINAI FIR, AS MENTIONED IN GREEK COORDINATION
    MESSAGE 151120 LGACYAYC JAN 2026, THROUGH THE JRCC PIRAEUS WHICH IS
    THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO COORDINATE SAR SUPPORT MISSION
    ACTIVITIES, AS REFERRED TO IN THE TURKISH NOTAM REQUEST MESSAGE
    250700 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    MOREOVER, TURKEY, IGNORING HCAA'S COORDINATION MESSAGE, NOT ONLY
    DISREGARDS THE SAFETY OF THE GENERAL AIR TRAFFIC WITHIN ATHINAI FIR
    BUT ALSO CAUSES DISRUPTION TO THE CIVIL AVIATION BY REQUESTING
    LONG-TERM RESERVATION OF AIRSPACE AND BY BLOCKING MOST ECONOMIC
    FLIGHT LEVELS, THUS COMPROMISING EFFICIENCY AND REGULARITY OF
    INTERNATIONAL CIVIL AVIATION TRAFFIC.
    CONSEQUENTLY, THE AREAS AS REQUESTED ARE NOT AVAILABLE.
    FOR THE ABOVE MENTIONED REASONS THE TURKISH NOTAM A0238/26 (200726
    EUECYIYN JAN 2026) IS NULL AND VOID AND NOT APPLICABLE TO ATHINAI FIR
    .

    LGGG-A0253/26
    DU: 09 02 2026 11:00 AU: 09 02 2026 13:00
    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) REF (A) GREEK NOTAM A0242/26 (020828 EUECYIYN FEB 2026)
    REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0385/26 (021028 EUECYIYN FEB 2026).
    NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:
    THIS NOTAM IS ISSUED TO STATE THAT THE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM
    A0385/26 (021028 EUECYIYN FEB 2026) IS NULL AND VOID SINCE IT REFERS
    TO ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS UIR, WHERE THE ONLY COMPETENT AUTHORITY TO
    PROMULGATE NOTAMS IN ACCORDANCE WITH ICAO RULES AND REGULATIONS IS
    THE HELLENIC CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY THROUGH ITS APPROPRIATE AIS
    UNIT.
    FURTHERMORE, THE ALLEGATIONS CONTAINED IN REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM
    A0385/26 (021028 EUECYIYN FEB 2026) ARE ERRONEOUS, MISLEADING AND
    DEVOID OF ANY LEGAL BASIS.
    WITHIN THE FRAMEWORK OF ITS WELL KNOWN AND LONG STANDING POSITIONS,
    WHICH ARE IN FULL COMPLIANCE WITH INTERNATIONAL LAW, GREECE WILL
    CONTINUE TO PLAN AND CONDUCT MILITARY EXERCISES IN THIS AREA, AS
    IT HAS REGULARLY BEEN DOING ALL ALONG.
    CONSEQUENTLY, THE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0385/26 (021028 EUECYIYN FEB
    2026) IS NULL AND VOID AND NOT APPLICABLE WITHIN ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS
    UIR.
    THE ONLY VALID AND EFFECTIVE NOTAM WITHIN ATHINAI FIR/ HELLAS UIR IS
    THE ABOVE REF (A) A0242/26 ISSUED BY GREECE.
    FINALLY, THE HELLENIC AUTHORITIES CATEGORICALLY REJECT THE ATTEMPT
    BY TURKEY TO INTRODUCE IN THE FLOW OF THE NOTAM ISSUING SYSTEM,
    POLITICALLY MOTIVATED STATEMENTS OF POSITIONS, WHICH, BESIDES BEING
    BASELESS, HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE FUNDAMENTAL PURPOSE OF THAT
    SYSTEM, NAMELY THE SAFETY OF AIR NAVIGATION.
    LIKEWISE, THE ABOVE REF (B) TURKISH NOTAM A0385/26 USES FALSE NAME TO
    DESIGNATE THE SPECIFIC GREEK ISLAND INSTEAD OF ITS
    INTERNATIONALLY KNOWN NAME.

    DESIGNATE THE SPECIFIC GREEK ISLANDS INSTEAD OF THEIR
    INTERNATIONALLY KNOWN NAMES.

HSSS FIR KHARTOUM FIR

    HSSS-A0116/25
    DU: 09 12 2025 04:00 AU: 08 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) HSSS
    Q) HSSS / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 1331N03130E999
    E) RESTRICTED AREA HSR5 ESTABLISHED ENCOMPASSING THE TERRITORY OF
    SUDAN. IN ACCORDANCE WITH KHARTOUM FIR CONTINGENCY PLAN, AVBL AT
    HTTPS://WWW2023.ICAO.INT/MID/PAGES/FIR/KHARTOUM-FIR-CP.ASPX
    OVER FLT OF RESTRICTED AREA HSR5 MAY ONLY BE CONDUCTED USING THE
    FLWNG CONTIGENCY ROUTE.
    -CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR8 NORTH BND TFC INBOUND OEJN AND OEMA TO PROCEED
     VIA ALRAP DCT KSL DCT ITMAP DCT BOGUM M562 MIPOL USNG FL300 BETWEEN
    ALRAP AND ITMAP, FL230 OR BELOW AT BOGUM.
    - CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR8 NORTH BND TFC NOT INBOUND OEJN AND OEMA TO
    PROCEED VIA ALRAP DCT KSL DCT ITMAP DCT BOGUM M562 MIPOL USNG EVEN
    FLIGHT LEVELS AT OR ABOVE FL300 UNTIL ITMAP, ODD FLS AT OR ABOVE
    FL310 AT BOGUM.
    -FOR NORTH BND TRAFFIC ON CR8 PILOTS SHALL CONTCT JEDDAH ACC 10 MIN
    PRIOR TO REACH MIPOL.
    -CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR9 SOUTH BND TFC OUTBOUND OEJN AND OEMA TO
    PROCEED VIA KAROX L311 MAHDI Q563 PSD DCT KSL DCT ALRAP USNG EVEN FLS
     AT OR BELOW FL280 UNTIL MAHDI, FL290 AT PSD.
    - CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR9 SOUTH BND TFC NOT OUTBOUND OEJN AND OEMA TO
    PROCEED VIA KAROX L311 MAHDI Q563 PSD DCT KSL DCT ALRAP USNG FL320 OR
     FL340 UNTIL MAHDI, FL310 OR FL330 AT PSD.
    -FOR SOUTH BND TFC CR9 PILOTS SHL CONTCT ADDIS ACC 10 MIN PRIOR TO
    REACH ALRAP.
    -CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR9 TFC TO REACH ASSIGNED FL 10 MIN PRIOR TO REACH
     KAROX
    -CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR10 NORTH BND TFC TO PROCEED VIA ALRAP DCT KSL
    DCT TOMRU P751 ALEBA USNG EVEN FLS, FL320 AND ABV.
    -FOR NORTH BND TRAFFIC ON CR10 PILOTS SHALL CONTCT CAIRO ACC 10 MIN
    PRIOR TO REACH ALEBA.
    -CONTINGENCY ROUTE CR10 SOUTH BND TFC TO PROCEED VIA ALEBA P751 TOMRU
     DCT KSL DCT ALRAP USING ODD FLS, FL350 AND ABOVE.

HHAA FIR ASMARA FIR

    HHAS-A0008/8
    DU: 28 05 2008 13:00 AU: PERM
    A) HHAA
    Q) HHAA / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 1609N04025E265

    A) LGGG
    Q) LGGG / QAFXX / IV / BO / E / 000/999 / 3705N02445E341
    E) OPS IN MINSK FIR (UMMV).
    THE HELLENIC CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY HEREBY DIRECTS THAT GREEK AIR
    CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF ACFT IN CHARGE OF AIR SERVICES MANAGED
    BY CARRIERS/HOLDERS OF AN OPERATING LICENCE ISSUED BY GREECE,
    WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR DE FACTO CARRIERS OR
    PERFORMING AIR SERVICES WITH A COMMERCIAL CHARTER AGREEMENT OR WITH
    A CODE SHARING AGREEMENT AND TO ALL FLT PERFORMED WITH A GREEK
    REGISTERED ACFT, SHALL NOT CONDUCT OPS IN FIR MINSK
    (UMMV), UNLESS THE USE OF THAT AIRSPACE IS DEEMED NECESSARY TO
    ENSURE SAFE OPERATION IN CASE OF UNFORESEEN CIRCUMSTANCES.
    FOREIGN AIR CARRIERS INBOUND TO THE EU ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID
    BELARUS MINSK FIR (UMMV). FOR MORE INFO SEE EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVE
    SD2021-02.

    LSSN-A0677/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS
    1. ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED, OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED
    BY CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR
    OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY THE
    SWISS AIRSPACE EXC HUMANITARIAN FLT, SEARCH AND RESCUE FLT AND
    LEASED ACFT ONE-WAY RTN FLT WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE
    SWISS AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LDG OR EMERGENCY
    OVERFLIGHT.
    FLIGHTS WITH A VALID DIPLOMATIC CLEARANCE NOT AFFECTED.
    2. AIRCRAFT OPERATORS OF NON-SCHEDULED FLT BETWEEN RUSSIA AND
    SWITZERLAND, OPERATED DIRECTLY OR VIA A THIRD COUNTRY, MUST NOTIFY
    ALL RELEVANT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE FLT PRIOR TO THEIR OPERATION
    AND AT LEAST 48 HR IN ADVANCE TO THE FEDERAL OFFICE OF CIVIL
    AVIATION. CONTACT FOR NOTIFICATION AND DOCUMENTS
    WWW.BAZL.ADMIN.CH/AVIATIONSANCTIONS.

    LSSN-A0678/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) SWISS AIR CARRIERS AND COMMANDERS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICE MANAGED BY CARRIERS HOLDERS OF OPERATING LICENCE ISSUED BY
    SWITZERLAND, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR DE FACTO
    CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICE WITH COMMERCIAL CHARTER AGREEMENT
    OR WITH CODE SHARING AND TO ALL FLIGHT PERFORMED WITH SWISS AIRCRAFT
    REGISTRATION, ARE REQUESTED TO CONSULT EASA SIB-2021-10 AND ARE
    REQUESTED TO AVOID MINSK FIR (UMMV).
    FOREIGN AIR CARRIERS INBOUND SWITZERLAND ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID
    MINSK FIR (UMMV).

OOMM FIR MUSCAT FIR

    OOMS-A0851/25
    DU: 15 12 2025 18:05 AU: 14 03 2026 02:30
    A) OOMM
    Q) OOMM / QANCD / I / NBO / E / 000/999 / 2105N05736E999
    D) DAILY 1700-0230
    E) DUE TO AIR TRAFFIC CONGESTION IN MUSCAT FIR RESULTING FROM THE
    SITUATION IN PAKISTAN AIRSPACE AND AIRSPACE CONGESTION. FLOW CONTROL
    MEASURES HAVE BEEN IMPLEMENTED FOR UAE DEPARTURES FROM 1700 TO 0230
    UTC:
    1) 4 MINUTES LONGITUDINAL SEPARATION BETWEEN ANY TWO SUCCESSIVE
    DEPARTURES ENTERING OOMM FIR VIA POSITIONS LABRI OR TARDI (LABRI AND
    TARDI SHALL BE CONSIDERED AS TWO POINTS).
    2) 4 MINUTES LONGITUDINAL SEPARATION BETWEEN ANY TWO SUCCESSIVE
    DEPARTURES ENTERING OOMM FIR VIA POSITIONS LALDO OR GOMTA (LALDO AND
    GOMTA SHALL BE CONSIDERED AS ONE POINT).
    NOTES:
    1- ALL UAE DEPARTURES VIA LALDO A791 IMLOT ARE EXEMPTED FROM THE FLOW
    CONTROL MEASURES.
    2- ALL UAE DEPARTURES LANDING AT OOMS/OOSH/OOSA ARE EXEMPTED FROM
    THESE FLOW MEASURES.
    3- ALL UAE DEPARTURE VIA MEMTU ARE EXEMPTED FROM THESE FLOW MEASURES.
    FROM SFC TO UNL

    OOMS-A0077/26
    DU: 29 01 2026 17:00 AU: 28 04 2026 02:30
    A) OOMM
    Q) OOMM / QANCD / I / NBO / E / 000/999 / 2235N05825E201
    D) DAILY 1700-0230
    E) DUE TO AIR TRAFFIC CONGESTION IN MUSCAT FLIGHT INFORMATION REGION
    RESULTING FROM THE RESTRICTION IN PAKISTAN AIRSPACE, FLOW CONTROL
    MEASURES HAVE BEEN IMPLEMENTED FOR DOHA DEPARTURES AS FOLLOW:
    REGARDLESS OF FLIGHT LEVELS, 4 MINUTES LONGITUDINAL SEPARATION
    BETWEEN ANY TWO SUCCESSIVE TRAFFIC EXITING OOMM FIR VIA POSITIONS
    RASKI, PARAR OR TOTOX
    NOTE:
    THE FOLLOWING DOHA DEPARTURES ARE EXEMPTED
    1) TRAFFIC ON AWY A791.
    2) TRAFFIC LANDING IN OMAN'S AIRPORTS.
    3) TRAFFIC ENTERING LABRI N318 LAKLU Q204.
    FROM SFC TO UNL

LIBB FIR BRINDISI FIR - LIMM FIR MILANO FIR - LIRR FIR ROMA FIR

    LIIA-E0064/26
    DU: 31 01 2026 23:00 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QSBXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ATS REPORTING OFFICE 'ARO/CBO ITALY' (ATS REPORTING OFFICE WITH
    CENTRAL BRIEFING CAPABILITIES) IS RESPONSIBLE H24 FOR THE DELIVERY
    OF ATS REPORTING AND AIS BRIEFING WITHIN THE WHOLE AIRSPACE UNDER
    ENAV S.P.A. (ITALIAN AGENCY FOR AIR NAVIGATION SERVICES)
    JURISDICTION.
    SERVICES ARE AVAILABLE VIA TELEPHONE, FAX AND EMAIL AS FOLLOWS:
    ENAV S.P.A. - ARO/CBO ITALY
    VIA APPIA NUOVA, 1491 - 00178 ROMA
    TEL: +39 06 79811011
    FAX: +39 06 79086500
    AFTN: LIRFZPZX
    EMAIL: AROCBO.LIRF(A)ENAV.IT
    ALL COMMUNICATIONS FROM/TO ABOVE MENTIONED PHONE NUMBERS WILL BE
    AUTOMATICALLY LOGGED.
    REMARK:
    USERS SHALL CHECK THE POSITIVE OUTCOME OF THE REQUEST MADE BY E-MAIL
    OR FAX.
    ATS REPORTING FOR AERODROMES WITHIN AIRSPACE UNDER ITALIAN AIR FORCE
    JURISDICTION IS PROVIDED BY ITALIAN AIR FORCE ARO ACCORDING
    TO LOCAL PROCEDURES.
    REF AIP GEN 3.1

    LIIA-E0133/26
    DU: 31 01 2026 23:00 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QSBXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4119N01321E999
    E) ADDRESSING OF FLIGHT PLAN MESSAGES:
    -FPL AND ASSOCIATED MSG FOR GENERAL AIR TFC DEP FM AN AERODROME
    UNDER ENAV S.P.A. (ITALIAN AGENCY FOR AIR NAVIGATION SERVICES)
    JURISDICTION IN VFR OR MIXED FLIGHT RULES (Z), SHALL BE ADDRESSED
    ONLY TO ARO-CBO ITALY (ATS REPORTING OFFICE WITH CENTRAL BRIEFING
    CAPABILITIES) - LIRFZPZX, WHICH WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THEIR
    VALIDATION AND DISTRIBUTION TO APPROPRIATE ATS UNIT.
    -AFTN ADDRESS LIIRZEZX SHALL BE ADDED TO THE LIST OF RECIPIENTS OF
    FPL AND ASSOCIATED MSG FOR VFR OR MIXED FLIGHT RULES (Y OR Z) TFC
    PLANNING TO FLY ONLY IN VFR WI ITALIAN FIR.
    REMARK:
    FPL RELATED TO EACH VFR AND/OR MIXED FLIGHT RULES (Z) STAGE OF A
    FLIGHT THROUGH INTERMEDIATE STOPS SHALL BE ADDRESSED SOLELY TO THE
    ARO ASSOCIATED TO THE DEPARTURE AERODROME OF THAT STAGE.
    REF AIP ENR 1.11-1

LCCC FIR NICOSIA FIR

    LCNC-A1519/25
    DU: 27 12 2025 07:36 AU: 27 03 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LCCC
    Q) LCCC / QCAXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3357N03220E205
    E) DUE TO THE SHUTTING DOWN OF THE DIRECT COMMUNICATION LINE BY
    TURKEY, DIRECT COMMUNICATION AND COORDINATION BETWEEN ANKARA AND
    NICOSIA AREA CONTROL CENTRES CAN NOT BE EFFECTED. THEREFORE AIRCRAFT
    INBOUND TO NICOSIA FIR FROM ANKARA FIR SHALL ESTABLISH RADIO CONTACT
    WITH NICOSIA ACC 10 MINUTES PRIOR TO ENTRY IN ORDER TO PASS
    ESSENTIAL FLIGHT DETAILS (CALLSIGN, FL, ETO ENTRY POINT):
    1. FOR TOMBI ABOVE FL345 ON FREQUENCY 125.5
    2. FOR TOMBI BELOW FL345 ON FREQUENCY 128.075
    3. FOR VESAR AND DOREN ALL LEVELS ON FREQUENCY 126.3
    4. AIRCRAFT INBOUND TO ANKARA FIR FROM NICOSIA FIR SHALL PASS
    FLIGHT DETAILS TO ANKARA ACC BEFORE ENTERING ANKARA FIR.

    FREQ 132.5MHZ AND HF 11300/5517/13288KHZ, TRAFFIC OPERATING WITHIN
    THE AREA BOUNDED BY WAYPOINTS:
    VEDET UL437 BUBEM
    DEMGO UW885/UB404 ARSHI
    ARSHI UW885/UT382 AVEDA
    BOMIX UB403 MUSBI
    SHALL REQUEST LEVEL CHANGES ONLY VIA CPDLC OR SATCOM. NO LEVEL
    CHANGES IN THE AFFECTED AREA FOR NON-CAPABLE AIRCRAFTS.
    TRAFFIC OPERATING INTO HCMH AND HCMI SHALL BROADCAST THEIR
    INTENTIONS ON THE SOMALI COMMON FREQ 127.45MHZ. TRAFFIC DEPARTING
    FROM HCMH AND HCMI INTENDING TO OPERATE ABOVE FL245 SHALL OBTAIN
    ENROUTE CLEARANCE FROM MOGADISHU ACC VIA CPDLC OR SATCOM PRIOR TO
    TAKEOFF.

    MOGADISHU ACC SOUTH VHF FREQ 132.7MHZ IS OPERATING NORMALLY. NO
    INTERFERENCE AFFECTING OPERATIONS.

HSSS FIR KHARTOUM FIR

    HSSS-A0002/26
    DU: 10 01 2026 19:59 AU: 09 04 2026 23:59 EST
    A) HSSS
    Q) HSSS / QCBXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 1331N03130E999
    E) IT HAS COME TO THE ATTENTION OF THE SOUTH SUDAN CIVIL AVIATION
    AUTHORITY (SSCAA) THAT SOME ACFT OPERATORS ARE OPERATING WITH ADS-B
    TRANSPONDERS SWITCHED OFF WHILE IN SOUTH SUDAN AIRSPACE.
    ALL ACFT OPERATING WITHIN SOUTH SUDAN AIRSPACE SHALL ENSURE THAT ADS-
    B TRANSPONDERS ARE SERVICEABLE AND OPERATED AT ALL TIMES IN
    ACCORDANCE WITH APPLICABLE AIR NAV RULES.
    THE INTL DEACTIVATION OF ADS-B TRANSPONDERS CONSTITUTES A SERIOUS
    VIOLATION OF SSCAA REGULATIONS AND POSES A RISK TO AVIATION SAFETY
    AND AIR TFC MANAGEMENT.
    ANY PILOT OR OPERATOR FOUND NON-COMPLIANT WILL BE SUBJECT TO
    ENFORCEMENT ACTION, INCLUDING POSSIBLE DENIAL OF PERMISSION TO
    OPERATE IN SOUTH SUDAN AIRSPACE.
    THIS REQUIREMENT IS MANDATORY AND EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY.

    ELLES INTERFERENT,

    BITCHE LORSQU'ELLES SONT ACTIVES.'

LTBB FIR ISTANBUL FIR - LGGG FIR ATHINAI FIR

    LTAA-A5936/25
    DU: 02 01 2026 05:00 AU: 31 12 2026 16:00
    A) LTBB LGGG
    Q) LTXX / QWELW / IV / BO / W / 000/100 / 3716N02614E014
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:

    1. TURKIYE REQUESTED THE GREEK AIS TO PROMULGATE APPROPRIATE NOTAM
    FOR THE EXERCISE AREA LOCATED WITHIN INTERNATIONAL WATERS AND
    AIRSPACE OF AEGEAN SEA REGARDING THE TURKISH NAVY AND AIRFORCE
    FIRING MILITARY EXERCISE (ASFAO) TO BE CONDUCTED FROM 02 JAN TILL
    31 DEC 2026 0500-1600UTC (EXCEPT SATURDAYS, SUNDAYS, HOLIDAYS) WITH
    REF 250826 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    GREEK AIS DID NOT PROMULGATE APPROPRIATE NOTAM FOR THE EXERCISE
    AREA IN ACCORDANCE WITH OUR REF 250826 DEC 2025. UNDER THESE
    CIRCUMSTANCES DUE TO THE INSISTENT ATTITUDE OF GREECE, TURKIYE IS
    LEFT WITH NO OTHER ALTERNATIVE BUT TO TAKE ITS OWN INITATIVE TO
    PROMULGATE THE NECESSARY NOTAM FOR THE EXERCISE AREA.
    TURKIYE WILL TAKE NECESSARY MEASURES FOR THE SAFETY OF THE GENERAL
    AIR TRAFFIC AS SHE DID IN THE PAST AND IS ALWAYS READY FOR
    COOPERATION AND COORDINATION IN THIS RESPECT.

    2. THE NOTAM INFORMATION FOR THE EXERCISE AREA IS AS FOLLOWED.
    TURKISH NAVY AND AIRFORCE SHALL MAKE 'ASFAO' EXERCISE IN
    INTERNATIONAL WATERS AND AIRSPACE OF AEGEAN SEA AS DESCRIBED BELOW.

    3. EXERCISE AREA:
    A. LATERAL LIMITS:
    AREA: 372700N0261700E 370830N0262730E 370500N0260900E
    372400N0260000E 372400N0260400E 372700N0261700E
    B. VERTICAL LIMITS: SFC-10000FT AMSL
    C. DATE AND TIMES:
    JAN 02 0500-1600
    JAN 05-30 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    FEB 02-MAR 18 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    MAR 23-APR 22 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    APR 24 0500-1600
    APR 27-APR 30 0500-1600
    MAY 04-15 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    MAY 18 0500-1600
    MAY 20-22 0500-1600
    MAY 25 0500-1600
    JUN 01-JUL 10 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    JUL 13 14 16 17 0500-1600
    JUL 20-OCT 23 MON-FRI 0500-1600
    OCT 26 27 30 0500-1600
    NOV 02- DEC 31 MON-FRI 0500-1600

    4. PROCEDURES FOR EXERCISE AIRCRAFT:
    A. THE FLIGHTS WILL BE CONDUCTED UNDER VFR CONDITIONS AND UNDER THE
    POSITIVE RADAR CONTROL.
    B. EXERCISE AIRCRAFT SHALL DISPLAY ANTI/COLLISION AND NAVIGATION
    LIGHTS CONTINUOUSLY.

    5. PROCEDURES FOR NON-EXERCISE AIRCRAFT:
    IN THE INTEREST OF FLYING SAFETY DURING THE EXERCISE NON-EXERCISE
    AIRCRAFT ARE STRONGLY ADVISED NOT TO FLY WITHIN THE EXERCISE AREA
    DESCRIBED ABOVE.
    F) SFC
    G) 10000FT AMSL

    LTAA-A0238/26
    DU: 23 01 2026 18:00 AU: 24 02 2026 17:00
    A) LTBB LGGG
    Q) LTXX / QWELW / IV / BO / W / 160/240 / 3805N02626E163
    E) NAVIGATIONAL WARNING TO ALL CONCERNED:

    1. TURKIYE REQUESTED THE GREEK AIS TO PROMULGATE APPROPRIATE NOTAM
    FOR THE EXERCISE AREAS LOCATED IN INTERNATIONAL WATERS WITHIN
    ATHINAI FIR REGARDING TURKISH NAVY SHALL MAKE 'ENVIRONMENTAL
    PROTECTION AND SAR SUPPORT MISSION' FLIGHTS WITHIN THE AIRSPACE OF
    AEGEAN SEA AND EAST MEDITERRANEAN BETWEEN JAN 23 2026 - FEB 24 2026
    WITH REF 250700 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    GREEK AIS DID NOT PROMULGATE APPROPRIATE NOTAM FOR THE EXERCISE
    AREAS IN ACCORDANCE WITH OUR MESSAGE 250700 LTAAYNYX DEC 2025.
    UNDER THESE CIRCUMSTANCES DUE TO THE INSISTENT ATTITUDE OF GREECE,
    TURKIYE IS LEFT WITH NO OTHER ALTERNATIVE BUT TO TAKE ITS OWN
    INITATIVE TO PROMULGATE THE NECESSARY NOTAM FOR THE EXERCISE AREAS.
    TURKIYE WILL TAKE NECESSARY MEASURES FOR THE SAFETY OF THE GENERAL
    AIR TRAFFIC AS SHE DID IN THE PAST AND IS ALWAYS READY FOR
    COOPERATION AND COORDINATION IN THIS RESPECT.

    FEB 01 03 05 07 09 11 13 15 17 19 21 0900-1600

    WILL TAKE PLACE WITHIN ATHINAI FIR AS DESCRIBED BELOW:
    1.- AREA: 345300N 0263200E - 345100N 0283000E - 340600N 0283000E -
    342000N 0271200E - 342000N 0265000E - 345300N 0263200E.
    AWYS L607 (SIT-PAXIS), L54 (LIAKI-PAXIS), L612 (SIT-KUMBI), N133
    (ANTAR-KPC), W54 (ORVIS-ANTAR), N132 (LAPSO-KUMBI), N139
    (NIPIS-KUMBI), A14 AND M1 (SIT-KAVOS), N129 (LATMO-KUMBI) AFFECTED.
    - VERTICAL LIMITS: FL150-FL200.
    2.- PROCEDURES FOR UNIT CONDUCTING THE ACTIVITIES:
    2.1.- FLIGHT PLANS MUST BE SUBMITTED AND PERMISSION BY APPROPRIATE
    ATC UNIT MUST BE OBTAINED.
    2.2.- OUT OF TMAS, THE LIAISONS OF THE UNIT CONDUCTING THE
    ACTIVITIES SHALL ESTABLISH CONTACT WITH ATHINAI CONTROL.
    3.- PROCEDURES FOR NON EXERCISE AIRCRAFT:
    3.1.- IN THE INTEREST OF SAFETY DURING ACTIVITIES, NON EXERCISE
    AIRCRAFT ARE STRONGLY ADVISED NOT TO FLY WITHIN THE AREA
    DESIGNATED IN PARA (1) ABOVE.
    3.2- OTHER AIRCRAFT UNABLE TO AVOID THE ABOVE DESCRIBED AREA WILL
    BE AUTHORIZED TO ENTER THIS AREA AFTER SPECIAL PERMISSION
    BY APPROPRIATE ATC UNIT.
    F) FL150
    G) FL200

    LESS THAN 10NM ACCORDING TO AIP-GREECE, ENR 1.1-1, PARA 1.1.1.2.1.

    APPENDIX 4, PARA 1.6 AND ACCORDING TO AIP-GREECE, ENR 1.10 AND GEN
    1.7-1.

    E) RESTRICTIONS RUSSIE ET BIELORUSSIE :
    1- IL EST INTERDIT A TOUT AERONEF EXPLOITE PAR DES TRANSPORTEURS AERIENS RUSSES, Y COMPRIS EN TANT QUE TRANSPORTEUR CONTRACTUEL DANS LE CADRE D'ACCORDS DE PARTAGE DE CODES OU DE RESERVATION DE CAPACITE, A TOUT AERONEF IMMATRICULE EN RUSSIE, A TOUT AERONEF NON IMMATRICULE EN RUSSIE QUI EST DETENU, AFFRETE OU CONTROLE D'UNE AUTRE MANIERE PAR UNE PERSONNE PHYSIQUE OU MORALE, UNE ENTITE OU UN ORGANISME RUSSE, D'ENTRER, DE QUITTER OU DE SURVOLER L'ESPACE AERIEN SOUVERAIN FRANCAIS, SAUF EN CAS D'ATTERRISAGE OU DE SURVOL D'URGENCE ET SAUF POUR LES VOLS TITULAIRES D'UNE AUTORISATION DEROGATOIRE DELIVREE PAR LES AUTORITEES FRANCAISES CONFORMEMENT AUX DISPOSITIONS EUROPENNES APPLICABLES
    2- IL EST INTERDIT A TOUT AERONEF EXPLOITE PAR DES TRANSPORTEURS AERIENS BIELORUSSES, Y COMPRIS EN TANT QUE TRANSPORTEUR CONTRACTUEL DANS LE CADRE D'ACCORDS DE PARTAGE DE CODES OU DE RESERVATION DE CAPACITE, D'ENTRER, DE QUITTER OU DE SURVOLER L'ESPACE AERIEN SOUVERAIN FRANCAIS SAUF EN CAS D'URGENCE ET SAUF POUR LES VOLS TITULAIRES D'UNE AUTORISATION DEROGATOIRE DELIVREE PAR LES AUTORITES FRANCAISES CONFORMEMENT AUX DISPOSITIONS EUROPENNES APPLICABLES
    3- IL EST INTERDIT DE PARTICIPER SCIEMMENT ET VOLONTAIREMENT A DES ACTIVITES AYANT POUR OBJET OU POUR EFFET DE CONTOURNER LES PRESENTES INTERDICTIONS.

HDAM DJIBOUTI-AMBOULI INTERNATIONAL

    HAAB-A0299/13
    DU: 12 08 2013 10:26 AU: PERM
    A) HDAM
    Q) HAAA / QXXXX / IV / NBO / AE / 000/999 / 1133N04310E999
    E) AIRCRAFT OVERFLYING THE REPUBLIC OF DJIBOUTI TERRITORY ARE SUBJECT
    TO PRIOR PERMISSION WHATEVER THE ALTITUDE IS. AIRCRAFT SHALL CONTACT
    DJIBOUTI APPROACH ON FREQUENCY 121.1MHZ,AT LEAST 10
    MINUTES PRIOR TO ENTERING DJIBOUTI AIRSPACE AND SQUAWKING ON A
    2000,IF EQUIPPED, WITHIN 80 NAUTICAL MILES OF DTI VOR-DME.
    AIRCRAFT ENTERING INTO DJIBOUTI TMA,SHALL SET SQUAWK A4300 RADIO
    CONTACT IS COMPULSORY ON 122.10MHZ OR 121.10MHZ WHILE FLYING IN
    THE UNCONTROLLED AIRSPACE CLASS G OF DJIBOUTI AT A DISTANCE OF 25
    NAUTICAL MILES FROM DTI VOR.

LGMK MIKONOS

    LGGG-B0017/26
    DU: 08 01 2026 14:33 AU: 08 04 2026 23:59
    A) LGMK
    Q) LGGG / QFAXX / IV / NBO / AE / 000/999 / 3726N02521E005
    E) ADVANCED ATC TOWER PROCEDURES IN PROGRESS.A-DPI AND C-DPI
    MESSAGES ARE SENT TO NMOC AND ARE USED FOR AIR TRAFFIC FLOW
    MANAGEMENT(ATFM) PURPOSES.AOBT(ACTUAL OFF BLOCKS TIMES)FOR ALL
    DEPARTING IFR FLIGHTS.
    1.1.ADS-B DATA REQUIRED FOR OPERATIONS.
    1.1.1.FOR ADS-B TESTS USED BY THE AD OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL, PILOTS
    OF AIRCRAFT EQUIPPED WITH MODE S  AND ADS-B FUNCTIONALITY MUST,WHEN
    OPERATING ON THE GROUND:
    A)SELECT AUTOMATIC MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A,OR
    B)IF AUTOMATIC MODE IS NOT AVAILABLE,SELECT ON AND THE ASSIGNED
    MODE A
    -FROM THE REQUEST OF PUSH-BACK.
    -AFTER LANDING, UNTIL THE AIRCRAFT HAS STOPPED ON ITS STAND.
    -WHEN THE AIRCRAFT IS FULLY PARKED,THE PILOT SHALL SELECT STBY.
    1.1.2. WHEN THE AIRCRAFT IS CAPABLE OF COMMUNICATING ITS
    IDENTIFICATION(I.E THE CALL SIGN USED IN FLIGHT),THIS MUST BE
    ENTERED (VIA THE FMS OR TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL)AT THE TIME OF
    THE PUSH-BACK REQUEST.
    1.1.3. THE CREW MUST USE THE FORMAT DEFINED BY ICAO TO ENTER THE
    AIRCRAFT IDENTIFICATION.
    1.1.4.IN ORDER NOT TO COMPROMISE THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED
    ON SSR FREQUENCIES (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS),TCAS
    SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP,AND
    SOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RUNWAY.
